sentences: Our client, a renowned company in their sector across the UK and Ireland are in search of an experienced IT & Software Development Manager to join their well- established team in Tyrone
· Responsible for the day-to-day productivity of the team
· Provide technical expertise on all aspects of the software and hardware development
· Ensuring progress reported consistently through daily reporting of activities
· Ensuring that KPIs are controlled and achieved
· Delegating work and projects across the team
· Working closely to the GIS team and the Design process team to develop new procedures and tools in line with a delivery-oriented approach
· Network solution design, maintenance, and optimisation
· Support junior members of the team with the technical queries
· Relevant IT Degree or Equivalent with a minimum of 2 years proven previous experience
· Strong knowledge of programming languages e
· Knowledge and experience of using ArcGIS or similar
· Excellent communication both written and verbal
What you need to do now
This truly is a great role, if you’re interested in this role, click ‘apply now’ to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV
Dungannon and South Tyrone, County Tyrone: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)
